allow_system_table_mods.name: allow_system_table_mods
allow_system_table_mods.short_desc: Allows modifications of the structure of system tables.

application_name.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
application_name.name: application_name
application_name.short_desc: Sets the application name to be reported in statistics and logs.

archive_command.name: archive_command
archive_command.short_desc: Sets the shell command that will be called to archive a WAL file.

archive_mode.name: archive_mode
archive_mode.short_desc: Allows archiving of WAL files using archive_command.

archive_timeout.name: archive_timeout
archive_timeout.short_desc: Forces a switch to the next xlog file if a new file has not been started within N seconds.

array_nulls.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
array_nulls.extra_desc: When turned on, unquoted NULL in an array input value means a null value; otherwise it is taken literally.
array_nulls.name: array_nulls
array_nulls.short_desc: Enable input of NULL elements in arrays.

authentication_timeout.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
authentication_timeout.name: authentication_timeout
authentication_timeout.short_desc: Sets the maximum allowed time to complete client authentication.

autovacuum_analyze_scale_factor.name: autovacuum_analyze_scale_factor
autovacuum_analyze_scale_factor.short_desc: Number of tuple inserts, updates, or deletes prior to analyze as a fraction of reltuples.

autovacuum_analyze_threshold.name: autovacuum_analyze_threshold
autovacuum_analyze_threshold.short_desc: Minimum number of tuple inserts, updates, or deletes prior to analyze.

autovacuum_freeze_max_age.name: autovacuum_freeze_max_age
autovacuum_freeze_max_age.short_desc: Age at which to autovacuum a table to prevent transaction ID wraparound.

autovacuum_max_workers.name: autovacuum_max_workers
autovacuum_max_workers.short_desc: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously running autovacuum worker processes.

autovacuum_naptime.name: autovacuum_naptime
autovacuum_naptime.short_desc: Time to sleep between autovacuum runs.

autovacuum_vacuum_cost_delay.name: autovacuum_vacuum_cost_delay
autovacuum_vacuum_cost_delay.short_desc: Vacuum cost delay in milliseconds, for autovacuum.

autovacuum_vacuum_cost_limit.name: autovacuum_vacuum_cost_limit
autovacuum_vacuum_cost_limit.short_desc: Vacuum cost amount available before napping, for autovacuum.

autovacuum_vacuum_scale_factor.name: autovacuum_vacuum_scale_factor
autovacuum_vacuum_scale_factor.short_desc: Number of tuple updates or deletes prior to vacuum as a fraction of reltuples.

autovacuum_vacuum_threshold.name: autovacuum_vacuum_threshold
autovacuum_vacuum_threshold.short_desc: Minimum number of tuple updates or deletes prior to vacuum.

backslash_quote.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
backslash_quote.name: backslash_quote
backslash_quote.short_desc: Sets whether "\'" is allowed in string literals.

bgwriter_delay.name: bgwriter_delay
bgwriter_delay.short_desc: Background writer sleep time between rounds.

bgwriter_lru_maxpages.name: bgwriter_lru_maxpages
bgwriter_lru_maxpages.short_desc: Background writer maximum number of LRU pages to flush per round.

bgwriter_lru_multiplier.name: bgwriter_lru_multiplier
bgwriter_lru_multiplier.short_desc: Multiple of the average buffer usage to free per round.

bonjour.name: bonjour
bonjour.short_desc: Enables advertising the server via Bonjour.

bytea_output.name: bytea_output
bytea_output.short_desc: Sets the output format for bytea.

check_function_bodies.name: check_function_bodies
check_function_bodies.short_desc: Check function bodies during CREATE FUNCTION.

checkpoint_completion_target.name: checkpoint_completion_target
checkpoint_completion_target.short_desc: Time spent flushing dirty buffers during checkpoint, as fraction of checkpoint interval.

checkpoint_segments.name: checkpoint_segments
checkpoint_segments.short_desc: Sets the maximum distance in log segments between automatic WAL checkpoints.

checkpoint_timeout.name: checkpoint_timeout
checkpoint_timeout.short_desc: Sets the maximum time between automatic WAL checkpoints.

checkpoint_warning.extra_desc: Write a message to the server log if checkpoints caused by the filling of checkpoint segment files happens more frequently than this number of seconds. Zero turns off the warning.
checkpoint_warning.name: checkpoint_warning
checkpoint_warning.short_desc: Enables warnings if checkpoint segments are filled more frequently than this.

client_encoding.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
client_encoding.name: client_encoding
client_encoding.short_desc: Sets the client's character set encoding.

client_min_messages.category: Reporting and Logging / When to Log
client_min_messages.extra_desc: Each level includes all the levels that follow it. The later the level, the fewer messages are sent.
client_min_messages.name: client_min_messages
client_min_messages.short_desc: Sets the message levels that are sent to the client.

commit_delay.name: commit_delay
commit_delay.short_desc: Sets the delay in microseconds between transaction commit and flushing WAL to disk.

commit_siblings.name: commit_siblings
commit_siblings.short_desc: Sets the minimum concurrent open transactions before performing commit_delay.

config_file.name: config_file
config_file.short_desc: Sets the server's main configuration file.

constraint_exclusion.extra_desc: Table scans will be skipped if their constraints guarantee that no rows match the query.
constraint_exclusion.name: constraint_exclusion
constraint_exclusion.short_desc: Enables the planner to use constraints to optimize queries.

cpu_index_tuple_cost.name: cpu_index_tuple_cost
cpu_index_tuple_cost.short_desc: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each index entry during an index scan.

cpu_operator_cost.name: cpu_operator_cost
cpu_operator_cost.short_desc: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each operator or function call.

cpu_tuple_cost.name: cpu_tuple_cost
cpu_tuple_cost.short_desc: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of processing each tuple (row).

cursor_tuple_fraction.name: cursor_tuple_fraction
cursor_tuple_fraction.short_desc: Sets the planner's estimate of the fraction of a cursor's rows that will be retrieved.

datestyle.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
datestyle.extra_desc: Also controls interpretation of ambiguous date inputs.
datestyle.name: DateStyle
datestyle.short_desc: Sets the display format for date and time values.

db_user_namespace.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
db_user_namespace.name: db_user_namespace

deadlock_timeout.name: deadlock_timeout
deadlock_timeout.short_desc: Sets the time to wait on a lock before checking for deadlock.

debug_pretty_print.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
debug_pretty_print.name: debug_pretty_print
debug_pretty_print.short_desc: Indents parse and plan tree displays.

debug_print_parse.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
debug_print_parse.name: debug_print_parse

debug_print_plan.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
debug_print_plan.name: debug_print_plan

debug_print_rewritten.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
debug_print_rewritten.name: debug_print_rewritten
debug_print_rewritten.short_desc: Logs each query's rewritten parse tree.

default_statistics_target.extra_desc: This applies to table columns that have not had a column-specific target set via ALTER TABLE SET STATISTICS.
default_statistics_target.name: default_statistics_target

default_tablespace.extra_desc: An empty string selects the database's default tablespace.
default_tablespace.name: default_tablespace
default_tablespace.short_desc: Sets the default tablespace to create tables and indexes in.

default_text_search_config.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
default_text_search_config.name: default_text_search_config

default_transaction_deferrable.name: default_transaction_deferrable
default_transaction_deferrable.short_desc: Sets the default deferrable status of new transactions.

default_transaction_isolation.name: default_transaction_isolation
default_transaction_isolation.short_desc: Sets the transaction isolation level of each new transaction.

default_transaction_read_only.name: default_transaction_read_only
default_transaction_read_only.short_desc: Sets the default read-only status of new transactions.

default_with_oids.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
default_with_oids.name: default_with_oids
default_with_oids.short_desc: Create new tables with OIDs by default.

dynamic_library_path.extra_desc: If a dynamically loadable module needs to be opened and the specified name does not have a directory component (i.e., the name does not contain a slash), the system will search this path for the specified file.
dynamic_library_path.name: dynamic_library_path
dynamic_library_path.short_desc: Sets the path for dynamically loadable modules.

effective_cache_size.extra_desc: That is, the portion of the kernel's disk cache that will be used for PostgreSQL data files. This is measured in disk pages, which are normally 8 kB each.
effective_cache_size.name: effective_cache_size
effective_cache_size.short_desc: Sets the planner's assumption about the size of the disk cache.

effective_io_concurrency.extra_desc: For RAID arrays, this should be approximately the number of drive spindles in the array.
effective_io_concurrency.name: effective_io_concurrency
effective_io_concurrency.short_desc: Number of simultaneous requests that can be handled efficiently by the disk subsystem.

enable_bitmapscan.name: enable_bitmapscan
enable_bitmapscan.short_desc: Enables the planner's use of bitmap-scan plans.

enable_hashagg.name: enable_hashagg
enable_hashagg.short_desc: Enables the planner's use of hashed aggregation plans.

enable_hashjoin.name: enable_hashjoin
enable_hashjoin.short_desc: Enables the planner's use of hash join plans.

enable_indexonlyscan.name: enable_indexonlyscan
enable_indexonlyscan.short_desc: Enables the planner's use of index-only-scan plans.

enable_indexscan.name: enable_indexscan
enable_indexscan.short_desc: Enables the planner's use of index-scan plans.

enable_material.name: enable_material
enable_material.short_desc: Enables the planner's use of materialization.

enable_mergejoin.name: enable_mergejoin
enable_mergejoin.short_desc: Enables the planner's use of merge join plans.

enable_nestloop.name: enable_nestloop
enable_nestloop.short_desc: Enables the planner's use of nested-loop join plans.

enable_seqscan.name: enable_seqscan
enable_seqscan.short_desc: Enables the planner's use of sequential-scan plans.

enable_sort.name: enable_sort
enable_sort.short_desc: Enables the planner's use of explicit sort steps.

enable_tidscan.name: enable_tidscan
enable_tidscan.short_desc: Enables the planner's use of TID scan plans.

escape_string_warning.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
escape_string_warning.name: escape_string_warning
escape_string_warning.short_desc: Warn about backslash escapes in ordinary string literals.

event_source.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
event_source.name: event_source
event_source.short_desc: Sets the application name used to identify PostgreSQL messages in the event log.

external_pid_file.name: external_pid_file
external_pid_file.short_desc: Writes the postmaster PID to the specified file.

extra_float_digits.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
extra_float_digits.extra_desc: This affects real, double precision, and geometric data types. The parameter value is added to the standard number of digits (FLT_DIG or DBL_DIG as appropriate).
extra_float_digits.name: extra_float_digits
extra_float_digits.short_desc: Sets the number of digits displayed for floating-point values.

from_collapse_limit.extra_desc: The planner will merge subqueries into upper queries if the resulting FROM list would have no more than this many items.
from_collapse_limit.name: from_collapse_limit
from_collapse_limit.short_desc: Sets the FROM-list size beyond which subqueries are not collapsed.

fsync.extra_desc: The server will use the fsync() system call in several places to make sure that updates are physically written to disk. This insures that a database cluster will recover to a consistent state after an operating system or hardware crash.
fsync.name: fsync
fsync.short_desc: Forces synchronization of updates to disk.

full_page_writes.extra_desc: A page write in process during an operating system crash might be only partially written to disk.  During recovery, the row changes stored in WAL are not enough to recover.  This option writes pages when first modified after a checkpoint to WAL so full recovery is possible.
full_page_writes.name: full_page_writes
full_page_writes.short_desc: Writes full pages to WAL when first modified after a checkpoint.

geqo.extra_desc: This algorithm attempts to do planning without exhaustive searching.
geqo.name: geqo

geqo_effort.name: geqo_effort
geqo_effort.short_desc: GEQO: effort is used to set the default for other GEQO parameters.

geqo_generations.extra_desc: Zero selects a suitable default value.
geqo_generations.name: geqo_generations
geqo_generations.short_desc: GEQO: number of iterations of the algorithm.

geqo_pool_size.extra_desc: Zero selects a suitable default value.
geqo_pool_size.name: geqo_pool_size
geqo_pool_size.short_desc: GEQO: number of individuals in the population.

geqo_seed.name: geqo_seed
geqo_seed.short_desc: GEQO: seed for random path selection.

geqo_selection_bias.name: geqo_selection_bias
geqo_selection_bias.short_desc: GEQO: selective pressure within the population.

geqo_threshold.name: geqo_threshold
geqo_threshold.short_desc: Sets the threshold of FROM items beyond which GEQO is used.

gin_fuzzy_search_limit.name: gin_fuzzy_search_limit
gin_fuzzy_search_limit.short_desc: Sets the maximum allowed result for exact search by GIN.

hot_standby.name: hot_standby
hot_standby.short_desc: Allows connections and queries during recovery.

hot_standby_feedback.name: hot_standby_feedback
hot_standby_feedback.short_desc: Allows feedback from a hot standby to the primary that will avoid query conflicts.

ignore_system_indexes.extra_desc: It does not prevent updating the indexes, so it is safe to use.  The worst consequence is slowness.
ignore_system_indexes.name: ignore_system_indexes

intervalstyle.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
intervalstyle.name: IntervalStyle
intervalstyle.short_desc: Sets the display format for interval values.

join_collapse_limit.extra_desc: The planner will flatten explicit JOIN constructs into lists of FROM items whenever a list of no more than this many items would result.
join_collapse_limit.name: join_collapse_limit
join_collapse_limit.short_desc: Sets the FROM-list size beyond which JOIN constructs are not flattened.

krb_caseins_users.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
krb_caseins_users.name: krb_caseins_users
krb_caseins_users.short_desc: Sets whether Kerberos and GSSAPI user names should be treated as case-insensitive.

krb_server_keyfile.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
krb_server_keyfile.name: krb_server_keyfile
krb_server_keyfile.short_desc: Sets the location of the Kerberos server key file.

krb_srvname.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
krb_srvname.name: krb_srvname
krb_srvname.short_desc: Sets the name of the Kerberos service.

lc_messages.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
lc_messages.name: lc_messages
lc_messages.short_desc: Sets the language in which messages are displayed.

lc_monetary.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
lc_monetary.name: lc_monetary
lc_monetary.short_desc: Sets the locale for formatting monetary amounts.

lc_numeric.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
lc_numeric.name: lc_numeric
lc_numeric.short_desc: Sets the locale for formatting numbers.

lc_time.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
lc_time.name: lc_time
lc_time.short_desc: Sets the locale for formatting date and time values.

listen_addresses.name: listen_addresses
listen_addresses.short_desc: Sets the host name or IP address(es) to listen to.

lo_compat_privileges.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
lo_compat_privileges.extra_desc: Skips privilege checks when reading or modifying large objects, for compatibility with PostgreSQL releases prior to 9.0.
lo_compat_privileges.name: lo_compat_privileges
lo_compat_privileges.short_desc: Enables backward compatibility mode for privilege checks on large objects.

local_preload_libraries.name: local_preload_libraries
local_preload_libraries.short_desc: Lists shared libraries to preload into each backend.

log_autovacuum_min_duration.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
log_autovacuum_min_duration.extra_desc: Zero prints all actions. -1 turns autovacuum logging off.
log_autovacuum_min_duration.name: log_autovacuum_min_duration
log_autovacuum_min_duration.short_desc: Sets the minimum execution time above which autovacuum actions will be logged.

log_checkpoints.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
log_checkpoints.name: log_checkpoints

log_connections.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
log_connections.name: log_connections

log_destination.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
log_destination.extra_desc: Valid values are combinations of "stderr", "syslog", "csvlog", and "eventlog", depending on the platform.
log_destination.name: log_destination
log_destination.short_desc: Sets the destination for server log output.

log_directory.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
log_directory.extra_desc: Can be specified as relative to the data directory or as absolute path.
log_directory.name: log_directory
log_directory.short_desc: Sets the destination directory for log files.

log_disconnections.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
log_disconnections.name: log_disconnections
log_disconnections.short_desc: Logs end of a session, including duration.

log_duration.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
log_duration.name: log_duration
log_duration.short_desc: Logs the duration of each completed SQL statement.

log_error_verbosity.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
log_error_verbosity.name: log_error_verbosity
log_error_verbosity.short_desc: Sets the verbosity of logged messages.

log_executor_stats.name: log_executor_stats
log_executor_stats.short_desc: Writes executor performance statistics to the server log.

log_file_mode.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
log_file_mode.extra_desc: The parameter value is expected to be a numeric mode specification in the form accepted by the chmod and umask system calls. (To use the customary octal format the number must start with a 0 (zero).)
log_file_mode.name: log_file_mode
log_file_mode.short_desc: Sets the file permissions for log files.

log_filename.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
log_filename.name: log_filename
log_filename.short_desc: Sets the file name pattern for log files.

log_hostname.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
log_hostname.extra_desc: By default, connection logs only show the IP address of the connecting host. If you want them to show the host name you can turn this on, but depending on your host name resolution setup it might impose a non-negligible performance penalty.
log_hostname.name: log_hostname
log_hostname.short_desc: Logs the host name in the connection logs.

log_line_prefix.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
log_line_prefix.extra_desc: If blank, no prefix is used.
log_line_prefix.name: log_line_prefix
log_line_prefix.short_desc: Controls information prefixed to each log line.

log_lock_waits.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
log_lock_waits.name: log_lock_waits

log_min_duration_statement.category: Reporting and Logging / When to Log
log_min_duration_statement.extra_desc: Zero prints all queries. -1 turns this feature off.
log_min_duration_statement.name: log_min_duration_statement
log_min_duration_statement.short_desc: Sets the minimum execution time above which statements will be logged.

log_min_error_statement.category: Reporting and Logging / When to Log
log_min_error_statement.extra_desc: Each level includes all the levels that follow it. The later the level, the fewer messages are sent.
log_min_error_statement.name: log_min_error_statement
log_min_error_statement.short_desc: Causes all statements generating error at or above this level to be logged.

log_min_messages.category: Reporting and Logging / When to Log
log_min_messages.extra_desc: Each level includes all the levels that follow it. The later the level, the fewer messages are sent.
log_min_messages.name: log_min_messages
log_min_messages.short_desc: Sets the message levels that are logged.

log_parser_stats.name: log_parser_stats
log_parser_stats.short_desc: Writes parser performance statistics to the server log.

log_planner_stats.name: log_planner_stats
log_planner_stats.short_desc: Writes planner performance statistics to the server log.

log_rotation_age.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
log_rotation_age.name: log_rotation_age
log_rotation_age.short_desc: Automatic log file rotation will occur after N minutes.

log_rotation_size.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
log_rotation_size.name: log_rotation_size
log_rotation_size.short_desc: Automatic log file rotation will occur after N kilobytes.

log_statement.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
log_statement.name: log_statement
log_statement.short_desc: Sets the type of statements logged.

log_statement_stats.name: log_statement_stats
log_statement_stats.short_desc: Writes cumulative performance statistics to the server log.

log_temp_files.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
log_temp_files.extra_desc: Zero logs all files. The default is -1 (turning this feature off).
log_temp_files.name: log_temp_files
log_temp_files.short_desc: Log the use of temporary files larger than this number of kilobytes.

log_timezone.category: Reporting and Logging / What to Log
log_timezone.name: log_timezone
log_timezone.short_desc: Sets the time zone to use in log messages.

log_truncate_on_rotation.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
log_truncate_on_rotation.name: log_truncate_on_rotation
log_truncate_on_rotation.short_desc: Truncate existing log files of same name during log rotation.

logging_collector.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
logging_collector.name: logging_collector
logging_collector.short_desc: Start a subprocess to capture stderr output and/or csvlogs into log files.

maintenance_work_mem.extra_desc: This includes operations such as VACUUM and CREATE INDEX.
maintenance_work_mem.name: maintenance_work_mem
maintenance_work_mem.short_desc: Sets the maximum memory to be used for maintenance operations.

max_connections.name: max_connections
max_connections.short_desc: Sets the maximum number of concurrent connections.

max_files_per_process.name: max_files_per_process
max_files_per_process.short_desc: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously open files for each server process.

max_locks_per_transaction.extra_desc: The shared lock table is sized on the assumption that at most max_locks_per_transaction * max_connections distinct objects will need to be locked at any one time.
max_locks_per_transaction.name: max_locks_per_transaction
max_locks_per_transaction.short_desc: Sets the maximum number of locks per transaction.

max_pred_locks_per_transaction.extra_desc: The shared predicate lock table is sized on the assumption that at most max_pred_locks_per_transaction * max_connections distinct objects will need to be locked at any one time.
max_pred_locks_per_transaction.name: max_pred_locks_per_transaction
max_pred_locks_per_transaction.short_desc: Sets the maximum number of predicate locks per transaction.

max_prepared_transactions.name: max_prepared_transactions
max_prepared_transactions.short_desc: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously prepared transactions.

max_stack_depth.name: max_stack_depth
max_stack_depth.short_desc: Sets the maximum stack depth, in kilobytes.

max_standby_archive_delay.name: max_standby_archive_delay
max_standby_archive_delay.short_desc: Sets the maximum delay before canceling queries when a hot standby server is processing archived WAL data.

max_standby_streaming_delay.name: max_standby_streaming_delay
max_standby_streaming_delay.short_desc: Sets the maximum delay before canceling queries when a hot standby server is processing streamed WAL data.

max_wal_senders.name: max_wal_senders
max_wal_senders.short_desc: Sets the maximum number of simultaneously running WAL sender processes.

password_encryption.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
password_encryption.extra_desc: When a password is specified in CREATE USER or ALTER USER without writing either ENCRYPTED or UNENCRYPTED, this parameter determines whether the password is to be encrypted.
password_encryption.name: password_encryption

port.name: port
port.short_desc: Sets the TCP port the server listens on.

post_auth_delay.extra_desc: This allows attaching a debugger to the process.
post_auth_delay.name: post_auth_delay
post_auth_delay.short_desc: Waits N seconds on connection startup after authentication.

pre_auth_delay.extra_desc: This allows attaching a debugger to the process.
pre_auth_delay.name: pre_auth_delay
pre_auth_delay.short_desc: Waits N seconds on connection startup before authentication.

quote_all_identifiers.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
quote_all_identifiers.name: quote_all_identifiers
quote_all_identifiers.short_desc: When generating SQL fragments, quote all identifiers.

random_page_cost.name: random_page_cost
random_page_cost.short_desc: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of a nonsequentially fetched disk page.

replication_timeout.name: replication_timeout
replication_timeout.short_desc: Sets the maximum time to wait for WAL replication.

search_path.name: search_path
search_path.short_desc: Sets the schema search order for names that are not schema-qualified.

seq_page_cost.name: seq_page_cost
seq_page_cost.short_desc: Sets the planner's estimate of the cost of a sequentially fetched disk page.

session_replication_role.name: session_replication_role
session_replication_role.short_desc: Sets the session's behavior for triggers and rewrite rules.

shared_buffers.name: shared_buffers
shared_buffers.short_desc: Sets the number of shared memory buffers used by the server.

shared_preload_libraries.name: shared_preload_libraries
shared_preload_libraries.short_desc: Lists shared libraries to preload into server.

sql_inheritance.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
sql_inheritance.name: sql_inheritance
sql_inheritance.short_desc: Causes subtables to be included by default in various commands.

ssl.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
ssl.name: ssl

ssl_ca_file.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
ssl_ca_file.name: ssl_ca_file
ssl_ca_file.short_desc: Location of the SSL certificate authority file.

ssl_cert_file.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
ssl_cert_file.name: ssl_cert_file
ssl_cert_file.short_desc: Location of the SSL server certificate file.

ssl_ciphers.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
ssl_ciphers.name: ssl_ciphers
ssl_ciphers.short_desc: Sets the list of allowed SSL ciphers.

ssl_crl_file.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
ssl_crl_file.name: ssl_crl_file
ssl_crl_file.short_desc: Location of the SSL certificate revocation list file.

ssl_key_file.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
ssl_key_file.name: ssl_key_file
ssl_key_file.short_desc: Location of the SSL server private key file.

ssl_renegotiation_limit.category: Connections and Authentication / Security and Authentication
ssl_renegotiation_limit.name: ssl_renegotiation_limit
ssl_renegotiation_limit.short_desc: Set the amount of traffic to send and receive before renegotiating the encryption keys.

standard_conforming_strings.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
standard_conforming_strings.name: standard_conforming_strings
standard_conforming_strings.short_desc: Causes '...' strings to treat backslashes literally.

statement_timeout.extra_desc: A value of 0 turns off the timeout.
statement_timeout.name: statement_timeout
statement_timeout.short_desc: Sets the maximum allowed duration of any statement.

stats_temp_directory.category: Statistics / Query and Index Statistics Collector
stats_temp_directory.name: stats_temp_directory
stats_temp_directory.short_desc: Writes temporary statistics files to the specified directory.

superuser_reserved_connections.name: superuser_reserved_connections
superuser_reserved_connections.short_desc: Sets the number of connection slots reserved for superusers.

synchronize_seqscans.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Previous PostgreSQL Versions
synchronize_seqscans.name: synchronize_seqscans

synchronous_commit.name: synchronous_commit
synchronous_commit.short_desc: Sets the current transaction's synchronization level.

synchronous_standby_names.name: synchronous_standby_names
synchronous_standby_names.short_desc: List of names of potential synchronous standbys.

syslog_facility.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
syslog_facility.name: syslog_facility
syslog_facility.short_desc: Sets the syslog "facility" to be used when syslog enabled.

syslog_ident.category: Reporting and Logging / Where to Log
syslog_ident.name: syslog_ident
syslog_ident.short_desc: Sets the program name used to identify PostgreSQL messages in syslog.

tcp_keepalives_count.extra_desc: This controls the number of consecutive keepalive retransmits that can be lost before a connection is considered dead. A value of 0 uses the system default.
tcp_keepalives_count.name: tcp_keepalives_count
tcp_keepalives_count.short_desc: Maximum number of TCP keepalive retransmits.

tcp_keepalives_idle.extra_desc: A value of 0 uses the system default.
tcp_keepalives_idle.name: tcp_keepalives_idle

tcp_keepalives_interval.extra_desc: A value of 0 uses the system default.
tcp_keepalives_interval.name: tcp_keepalives_interval

temp_buffers.name: temp_buffers
temp_buffers.short_desc: Sets the maximum number of temporary buffers used by each session.

temp_file_limit.name: temp_file_limit
temp_file_limit.short_desc: Limits the total size of all temporary files used by each session.

temp_tablespaces.name: temp_tablespaces
temp_tablespaces.short_desc: Sets the tablespace(s) to use for temporary tables and sort files.

timezone.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
timezone.name: TimeZone
timezone.short_desc: Sets the time zone for displaying and interpreting time stamps.

timezone_abbreviations.category: Client Connection Defaults / Locale and Formatting
timezone_abbreviations.name: timezone_abbreviations
timezone_abbreviations.short_desc: Selects a file of time zone abbreviations.

trace_notify.name: trace_notify
trace_notify.short_desc: Generates debugging output for LISTEN and NOTIFY.

trace_recovery_messages.extra_desc: Each level includes all the levels that follow it. The later the level, the fewer messages are sent.
trace_recovery_messages.name: trace_recovery_messages
trace_recovery_messages.short_desc: Enables logging of recovery-related debugging information.

trace_sort.name: trace_sort
trace_sort.short_desc: Emit information about resource usage in sorting.

track_activities.category: Statistics / Query and Index Statistics Collector
track_activities.extra_desc: Enables the collection of information on the currently executing command of each session, along with the time at which that command began execution.
track_activities.name: track_activities

track_activity_query_size.name: track_activity_query_size
track_activity_query_size.short_desc: Sets the size reserved for pg_stat_activity.query, in bytes.

track_counts.category: Statistics / Query and Index Statistics Collector
track_counts.name: track_counts

track_functions.category: Statistics / Query and Index Statistics Collector
track_functions.name: track_functions
track_functions.short_desc: Collects function-level statistics on database activity.

track_io_timing.category: Statistics / Query and Index Statistics Collector
track_io_timing.name: track_io_timing
track_io_timing.short_desc: Collects timing statistics for database I/O activity.

transaction_deferrable.name: transaction_deferrable
transaction_deferrable.short_desc: Whether to defer a read-only serializable transaction until it can be executed with no possible serialization failures.

transaction_isolation.name: transaction_isolation
transaction_isolation.short_desc: Sets the current transaction's isolation level.

transaction_read_only.name: transaction_read_only
transaction_read_only.short_desc: Sets the current transaction's read-only status.

transform_null_equals.category: Version and Platform Compatibility / Other Platforms and Clients
transform_null_equals.extra_desc: When turned on, expressions of the form expr = NULL (or NULL = expr) are treated as expr IS NULL, that is, they return true if expr evaluates to the null value, and false otherwise. The correct behavior of expr = NULL is to always return null (unknown).
transform_null_equals.name: transform_null_equals

unix_socket_directory.name: unix_socket_directory
unix_socket_directory.short_desc: Sets the directory where the Unix-domain socket will be created.

unix_socket_group.extra_desc: The owning user of the socket is always the user that starts the server.
unix_socket_group.name: unix_socket_group
unix_socket_group.short_desc: Sets the owning group of the Unix-domain socket.

unix_socket_permissions.extra_desc: Unix-domain sockets use the usual Unix file system permission set. The parameter value is expected to be a numeric mode specification in the form accepted by the chmod and umask system calls. (To use the customary octal format the number must start with a 0 (zero).)
unix_socket_permissions.name: unix_socket_permissions
unix_socket_permissions.short_desc: Sets the access permissions of the Unix-domain socket.

update_process_title.category: Statistics / Query and Index Statistics Collector
update_process_title.extra_desc: Enables updating of the process title every time a new SQL command is received by the server.
update_process_title.name: update_process_title
update_process_title.short_desc: Updates the process title to show the active SQL command.

vacuum_cost_limit.name: vacuum_cost_limit
vacuum_cost_limit.short_desc: Vacuum cost amount available before napping.

vacuum_cost_page_dirty.name: vacuum_cost_page_dirty
vacuum_cost_page_dirty.short_desc: Vacuum cost for a page dirtied by vacuum.

vacuum_cost_page_hit.name: vacuum_cost_page_hit
vacuum_cost_page_hit.short_desc: Vacuum cost for a page found in the buffer cache.

vacuum_cost_page_miss.name: vacuum_cost_page_miss
vacuum_cost_page_miss.short_desc: Vacuum cost for a page not found in the buffer cache.

vacuum_defer_cleanup_age.name: vacuum_defer_cleanup_age
vacuum_defer_cleanup_age.short_desc: Number of transactions by which VACUUM and HOT cleanup should be deferred, if any.

vacuum_freeze_min_age.name: vacuum_freeze_min_age
vacuum_freeze_min_age.short_desc: Minimum age at which VACUUM should freeze a table row.

vacuum_freeze_table_age.name: vacuum_freeze_table_age
vacuum_freeze_table_age.short_desc: Age at which VACUUM should scan whole table to freeze tuples.

wal_buffers.name: wal_buffers
wal_buffers.short_desc: Sets the number of disk-page buffers in shared memory for WAL.

wal_keep_segments.name: wal_keep_segments
wal_keep_segments.short_desc: Sets the number of WAL files held for standby servers.

wal_level.name: wal_level
wal_level.short_desc: Set the level of information written to the WAL.

wal_receiver_status_interval.name: wal_receiver_status_interval
wal_receiver_status_interval.short_desc: Sets the maximum interval between WAL receiver status reports to the primary.

wal_sync_method.name: wal_sync_method
wal_sync_method.short_desc: Selects the method used for forcing WAL updates to disk.

wal_writer_delay.name: wal_writer_delay
wal_writer_delay.short_desc: WAL writer sleep time between WAL flushes.

work_mem.extra_desc: This much memory can be used by each internal sort operation and hash table before switching to temporary disk files.
work_mem.name: work_mem
work_mem.short_desc: Sets the maximum memory to be used for query workspaces.

xmlbinary.name: xmlbinary
xmlbinary.short_desc: Sets how binary values are to be encoded in XML.

xmloption.name: xmloption
xmloption.short_desc: Sets whether XML data in implicit parsing and serialization operations is to be considered as documents or content fragments.

zero_damaged_pages.extra_desc: Detection of a damaged page header normally causes PostgreSQL to report an error, aborting the current transaction. Setting zero_damaged_pages to true causes the system to instead report a warning, zero out the damaged page, and continue processing. This behavior will destroy data, namely all the rows on the damaged page.
zero_damaged_pages.name: zero_damaged_pages
zero_damaged_pages.short_desc: Continues processing past damaged page headers.
